name: European Association of Payment Service Providers for Merchants
goal: The "European Association of Payment Service Providers for Merchants" (EPSM) is an interest representation and information platform of more than 65 European organisations. Voting members are payment network operators, acquirers and other payment service providers for merchants. Among the non-voting members are terminal manufacturers, processing providers and payment schemes.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: PSD2, Interchange Regulation, SEPA Regulation, NIS Directive, AML, GDPR, Cloud Services, Brexit, DCC Regulation, Payments Regulation in General
